scripts.pdf:lin: for f in supports/*.md;       do md-to-pdf --document-title "$(basename "${f}" .md)" --config-file ./.vitepress/pdf-config.json "${f}" ; done && mv supports/*.pdf .vitepress/dist/supports/
scripts.pdf:win: for /r %F in (supports\*.md) do md-to-pdf --document-title "%~nF"                     --config-file .\.vitepress\pdf-config.json "%F"        && mv supports/*.pdf .vitepress/dist/supports/
